name: Railway Escape
summary: Battle hundreds of monsters and survive as long as you can in Railway Escape. Protect your train at all costs and upgrade your arsenal of weapons to become more powerful in this Bullet Hell game. It is up to you to clear a path to safety for you and the passengers on the last train to freedom on earth. Exciting gameplay, hordes of monsters, many weapon combinations and thrilling music will make Railway Escape your goto game when you have a few minutes to spare.
